title: Figures from a Retable of the Virgin and Child, with Saint Catherine of Alexandria, Saint Apollonia, Saint Margaret of Antioch, and (possibly) Saint Mary Kleophas
medium: alabaster with traces of polychromy, in a modern tabernacle with four replaced canopies
dimensions:
overall: 100 × 50 cm (39 3/8 × 19 11/16 in.)
part of object (Virgin and Child): 62 × 19 × 6 cm (24 7/16 × 7 1/2 × 2 3/8 in.)
part of object (female Saints): 25 × 7 × 3 cm (9 13/16 × 2 3/4 × 1 3/16 in.)
